DFRobotWiFiIoTUART.mqttSetup|block: MQTT 配置|IOT_ID(用户): %IOT_ID| IOT_PWD(密码) :%IOT_PWD| Topic(默认topic_0): %IOT_TOPIC|服务器:%SERVERS||IP(SIOT):%IP
DFRobotWiFiIoTUART.WIFISetup|block: WiFi 初始设置 | 引脚设置: | 接收数据(绿色导线): %receive| 发送数据(蓝色导线): %send | Wi-Fi: | 名称: %SSID| 密码: %PASSWORD 启动连接
DFRobotWiFiIoTUART.mqttCallbackUser|bloc: 在 topic_0 收到消息时运行
DFRobotWiFiIoTUART.httpPost|block: http(post) | url %url| content %content| 超时(毫秒) %time
DFRobotWiFiIoTUART.httpPut|block: http(put) | url %url| content %content| 超时(毫秒) %time
DFRobotWiFiIoTUART.ThingSpeakSend|block: ThingSpeak 发送 值1: %field1||值2: %field2|值3: %field3|值4: %field4|值5: %field5|值6: %field6|值7: %field7 值8: %field8
DFRobotWiFiIoTUART.IFTTTSend|block: IFTTT 发送 值1 %value1| 值2 %value2| 值3 %value3
DFRobotWiFiIoTUART.httpSetup|block: 配置 http | ip: %IP| port: %PORT | 开始连接
DFRobotWiFiIoTUART.IFTTTConfigure|block: IFTTT 配置事件: %EVENT 密钥: %KEY
DFRobotWiFiIoTUART.sendmessage|block: BeeBotte 频道: %channel 资源: %resource 发送数据 %data
